Monster Rancher Game Arrives For Cell Phones In Japan!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2002 Topics ( Year Of The Password): Monster Rancher Game Arrives For Cell Phones In Japan!
By Lisa Shock on Friday, September 20, 2002 - 10:00 am:

I was looking at a new press release from Tecmo Japan, and it looks like they have a new version of Monster Farm (that's what Rancher is called in Japan) called Monster Farm Travel, being carried by three different phone services in Japan. The press release does not give details on gameplay, sorry. It is really quite brief.

Sorry folks, there's no way for me to import this one!

By DigMoshMogi on Friday, September 20, 2002 - 05:29 pm:

Maybe everytime you get a call you can turn the call into a monster. Based on the pitch of the callers voice and length of the call. Hehe then you can have Tecmo call you so you can get rares.

By Hare Brained on Thursday, September 26, 2002 - 01:19 pm:

By Lisa Shock on Friday, October 25, 2002 - 11:03 am:

Tecmo now has an Official Website for this game! Just thought you might like to know what we're missing!
